P2.description:
## 项目

使用memos的API构建一个微信朋友圈的页面

https://github.com/jkjoy/memos

## 使用

更改`index.html`中的`host`  `limit` `creatorId`  `twikoo` 即可
```js
                    <script>
                        const memos = {
                            host: 'https://memos.ee', //memos地址
                            limit: '1000',
                            creatorId: '3',
                            domId: '#posts',
                            twikoo: 'https://t.memos.ee',
                        };
                    </script>
```
。
P2.script: <script src='https://blog.meekdai.com/Gmeek/plugins/lightbox.js'></script><script src='https://blog.meekdai.com/Gmeek/plugins/articletoc.js'></script><script>const linkElement = document.createElement('link'); linkElement.rel = 'stylesheet'; linkElement.href = 'https://cdn.imsun.org/lxgw-wenkai-screen-webfont/lxgwwenkaigbscreen.css'; linkElement.onload = function() { const styleElement = document.createElement('style'); styleElement.innerHTML = `* { font-family: \"LXGW WenKai Screen\", sans-serif !important; }`; document.head.appendChild(styleElement); }; document.head.appendChild(linkElement);</script>
